description: The perfect choice for day hikes or lightweight overnight trips on the trail, the Vento GTX represents an amazing value in spite of its premium feature set. Made in Europe, the Vento GTX features a suede and fabric upper, backed by GORE-TEX® for guaranteed waterproof protection, with a PU toe rand for protection. Underfoot, the combination of a PU midsole and Vibram® rubber outsole ensure long-lasting cushioning and support, sure to carry you comfortably to your destination in style.
name: Scarpa Vento GTX - Mens

specs.value: Suede and fabric upper for lightweight support
Gore-tex® Performance Comfort technology is waterproof
PU toe rand for enhanced upper protection
Direct-injection PU midsole for long-lasting cushioning
Vibram® outsole with XS Trek rubber for traction and durability
